text: In our build javadoc arguments became too long and javadoc started to  blue screen Windows in ClearCase MVFS system. IBM will fix ClearCase eventually, but <javadoc> should not generate such big command lines in the first place. All options should go into a temporary option file for <javadoc>, not just a file list.
creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
According to
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/tooldocs/solaris/javadoc.html#argumentfile
the @argumentfile must not contain anything but file or package names in JDK 1.3.

Could you please modify your patch to only use the external file for other
command line arguments if javadoc4 is true?

Created attachment 10350
proposed patch that  affects JDK 1.4+ only
